sentences.english: Captain Mayes was amazed by the amount of time and effort put into building the set.
sentences.chinese: 梅耶斯上尉對佈景所花費的時間和精力感到不可思議。

sentences.english: Watching those blocky minifigures walk around their sets will make you smile.
sentences.chinese: 看那些塊狀迷你人偶在佈景中走來走去會讓你發笑。

sentences.english: Set this key to the command used to create thumbnails for themes.
sentences.chinese: 本設定鍵的內容是爲佈景主題製作縮圖所用的指令。

sentences.english: Instead of stagehands, the actors will move the scenery right in front of the audience.
sentences.chinese: 演員們將替代舞臺工作人員，當着觀衆的面置換佈景。

sentences.english: I hate to sit there and look at the same stage scenery one scene after another.
sentences.chinese: 我看戲最討厭一幕接一幕合用一個佈景。

sentences.english: Stylist on set and Assistant Production manager for the organization and shooting of several videos, in Milan and Sardinia.
sentences.chinese: 佈景造型設計以及米蘭和薩丁島協調與拍攝副導。

sentences.english: They dropped in the scenery for the next act.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲下一場戲放下了佈景幕。

sentences.english: The set of ‘Hereafter’ was one of happiest places I’ve ever been.
sentences.chinese: 《來世》的佈景是我去過的最快樂的地方。

sentences.english: I hate to sit there and look at the same stage scenery one act after another .
sentences.chinese: 我看戲最討厭一幕接一幕合用一個佈景。

sentences.english: Their set designs are always stunning.
sentences.chinese: 他們的佈景設計經常讓人拍案叫絕。

sentences.english: They will jog in another piece of scenery to fill the space.
sentences.chinese: 他們會另外加一塊佈景填充空間的。

sentences.english: B:I think it's the most successful film in scene-setting and music.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲佈景和音樂最爲成功。

sentences.english: The Chinese film has a gorgeous setting and a mildly charming plot.
sentences.chinese: 這部中國電影的佈景華麗，情節輕鬆又幽默。

sentences.english: The warm, classic interior was the perfect setting.
sentences.chinese: 而這家酒店溫馨典雅的裝飾也成爲婚禮最完美的佈景。

sentences.english: The playwright, the set designer, the wardrobe lady , all get credit.
sentences.chinese: 劇作家，佈景設計者，服裝師，大家都應得到榮譽。

sentences.english: Keep the setting, props and number of necessary characters modest.
sentences.chinese: 保持適度的佈景和道具，必要的人物數量也要適中。

definition: to put in order/to arrange/to decorate/to fix up/to deploy
merry-go-round/carousel/Carousel, South Korean TV soap opera
to enhance by contrast/to set off/to serve as a background in order to bring out the subject with greater brilliance/to serve as a prop/a foil
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
